meanings.definition: To make or become like the Western world in customs, ideas, or technology.
meanings.sent1: The small town slowly westernized as more people embraced modern ideas.
meanings.sent2: Many countries have westernized their educational systems to keep up with global standards.
meanings.sent3: The old cowboy hat westernized the look of the young man, making him seem like a character from a movie.
meanings.sent4: Her traditional recipe was westernized with the addition of new spices, creating a unique fusion dish.
meanings.sent5: The once traditional village was westernized by the arrival of a big shopping mall, changing its atmosphere completely.
